code: @Test public void testCamelHystrix() throws Exception {     // install the camel blueprint xml file we use in this test     URL url = ObjectHelper.loadResourceAsURL("org/apache/camel/itest/CamelHystrixTest.xml", CamelHystrixTest.class.getClassLoader()).     installBlueprintAsBundle("CamelHystrixTest", url, true).     // lookup Camel from OSGi     CamelContext camel = getOsgiService(bundleContext, CamelContext.class).     // test camel     MockEndpoint mock = camel.getEndpoint("mock:result", MockEndpoint.class).     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("Fallback message").     camel.createProducerTemplate().sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     mock.assertIsSatisfied(). }
